titles: The children of Abrahams faith who are blessed, being found in Abraham's practise of burying their dead in their own purchased burying places, are not to be reproved: but therein are justified in the sight of God, and the practice of holy men in former ages.
author: Gawler, Francis.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library, Cambridge, England.
keywords: Funeral rites and ceremonies --  Early works to 1800.
